channel.description: Week 10 Announcements This Week Tue 10/28: Discuss 2 Fri 10/31: Discuss 3 Response Fri 10/31: Lab 5 Quizzes Lab 5 Move to Cloud 2 Droplets on DO Set up SSH & Firewall Simple Apache Sites DNS Name Docker Reverse Proxy Lab 5 Grading SSH to Frontend SSH to Backend Firewall, Date/Time Apache, DNS, HTTPS Docker Reverse Proxy GitHub Pack https://education.github.com/pack https://try.digitalocean.com/ freetrialoffer/ https://nc.me Ask Me For Credits! Total Cost - $11 Final Project Build Something or Fix Something Web Resource for New Startup Set up Laptops for a School Design Central Auth for Company Thin Clients vs. Thick in Labs Chat with me for ideas Speaker: Kyle Hutson Lambda Labs https://lambdalabs.com/ Formerly KANREN Formerly Beocat Tuesday 10/28 2:30 PM Keep in Touch!
